% A LaTeX template for submissions to
% Mathematical Methods in the Applied Sciences (MMA)
% Derived from wileyNJD-AMA.tex.
<<MinimumVersion: 1.0.0>>
<<% >>
<<TemplateDescription mma: Mathematical Methods in the Applied Sciences>>
<<% >>
<<Dependency: WileyNJD-v2-mma.cls>>
<<Dependency: WileyNJD-VANCOUVER.bst>>
<<Dependency: postpreamble-mma.sty>>
<<% >>
<<CreateCustomBibliography: --arxivtotypeornote --doitourl --haltotypeornote --urntonote>>

% Prepreamble follows.
<<LaTeXPrePreamble>>

% Load the documentclass.
% NOTE
% The template wileyNJD-AMA.tex uses the 'AMA' documentclass option, which results in
% the bibliography style WileyNJD-AMA.bst being used. This, however, requires a number of
% non-standard fields to be set for various entry types.
% Therefore, we resort to the WileyNJD-VANCOUVER.bst style, which is also used, e.g., by
% the Numerical Linear Algebra and Applications (NLA) template.
\documentclass[%
VANCOUVER,
STIX1COL,
proof,
<<DocumentClassOptions>>]{WileyNJD-v2-mma}

% Preamble follows.
<<LaTeXPreamble>>

% Set article type.
\articletype{Original Paper}

% Set relevant dates.
\received{TBD}
\revised{TBD}
\accepted{TBD}

% Setup document metadata.
\makeatletter
\@ifpackageloaded{hyperref}{%
	\hypersetup{
		pdftitle = {<<Title>>},
		pdfauthor = {<<AuthorsFullNamesCommaSeparated>>},
		pdfkeywords = {<<KeywordsCommaSeparated>>},
		pdfcreator = {<<ScoopTemplateEngineSignature>>}
	}
}{
	\pdfinfo{
		/Title (<<Title>>)
		/Author (<<AuthorsFullNamesCommaSeparated>>)
		/Subject ()
		/Keywords (<<KeywordsCommaSeparated>>)
		/Creator (<<ScoopTemplateEngineSignature>>)
	}
}
\makeatother

\begin{document}

% Set title, subtitle and funding information.
\title{<<TitleNewlineSubTitle>>\protect<<FundingThanks>>}

% Set author information.
<<AuthorsInstitutionsWiley>>
\authormark{<<AuthorsRunningHeadWiley>>}

% Insert the abstract.
<<CommentIfAbstractEmpty>>\abstract[Abstract]{%
<<CommentIfAbstractNonEmpty>>\abstract[]{%
<<InputAbstract>>
<<CommentIfAbstractNonEmpty>>}
<<CommentIfAbstractEmpty>>}

% Insert the keywords.
<<CommentIfKeywordsEmpty>>\keywords{<<KeywordsCommaSeparated>>}

% Insert how-to-cite info.
\jnlcitation{\cname{<<ShortAuthorsWiley>>}, (\cyear{TBD}), \ctitle{<<Title>>}, \cjournal{<<JournalNameEscaped>>}, \cvol{TBD}.}

\maketitle

% Insert the dedication information.
<<DedicationFootnoteText>>

% Insert the document body.
<<InputBody>>

% Insert the appendix.
\appendix
<<InputAppendix>>

% Insert the bibliography.
<<CustomBibliographyWithoutExtension>>

\end{document}
